channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Voxmeter, 17–23 June 2024 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Danmarksdemokraterne (ECR): 1–2 seats
  • Socialdemokraterne (S&D): 3–4 seats
  • Alternativet (Greens/EFA): 0 seats
  • Moderaterne (RE): 1 seats
  • Liberal Alliance (EPP): 2–3 seats
  • Det Konservative Folkeparti (EPP): 0–1 seats
  • Venstre (RE): 1–2 seats
  • Enhedslisten–De Rød-Grønne (GUE/NGL): 0–1 seats
  • Radikale Venstre (RE): 0–1 seats
  • Dansk Folkeparti (ID): 0–1 seats
  • Socialistisk Folkeparti (Greens/EFA): 3–4 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Voxmeter, 17–23 June 2024 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Voxmeter, 17–23 June 2024 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Danmarksdemokraterne (ECR): 7.4–11.0%
  • Socialdemokraterne (S&D): 16.1–20.9%
  • Alternativet (Greens/EFA): 1.1–2.7%
  • Moderaterne (RE): 5.1–8.2%
  • Liberal Alliance (EPP): 11.2–15.3%
  • Det Konservative Folkeparti (EPP): 4.6–7.6%
  • Venstre (RE): 8.0–11.7%
  • Enhedslisten–De Rød-Grønne (GUE/NGL): 5.0–8.0%
  • Radikale Venstre (RE): 4.1–6.9%
  • Dansk Folkeparti (ID): 3.4–6.1%
  • Socialistisk Folkeparti (Greens/EFA): 16.5–21.3%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Verian for Berlingske, 9–14 June 2024 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
